title: Remove Statistics block from My Official Profile employer page

requirements.summary: Remove the entire "Статистика" section from the employer "My Official Profile" page without altering any other UI, styling, layout, behavior, or data logic.
acceptanceCriteria: On the employer page (My Official Profile), the card/section titled "Статистика" is no longer rendered.
No other sections on the page are removed, reordered, restyled, or functionally changed (e.g., company data section, rating history section, modals, navigation).
The app builds successfully after removal.

file_operations.description: Remove the JSX block labeled "Statistics Panel" that renders the "Статистика" title and its metric cards, leaving surrounding sections and all existing data fetching/business logic intact. After removal, perform the minimum necessary cleanup in this same file only (e.g., remove any now-unused local handler(s) or imports that would cause the TypeScript build to fail), without changing runtime behavior elsewhere.
